person.note: Xu(3) Xuemo [30593] CHECK biographical sources cited in Lidai renwu linian tongpu. RM, p. 797. Jiangnan TZ, 122.41a and 128.21b had mingzi as Xueshi (學詩), but must be this person (see RM).From Hartwell's ACTIVITY table:1543: passed juren exam.
